channel.title: Announcement on AsyncAPI Initiative
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on AsyncAPI Initiative

item.title: AsyncAPI 2.0.0 important dates
item.description: Hey folks! After some time thinking about it, I’ve decided it’s time to define some important dates for AsyncAPI 2.0.0. So here we go! End of review period (July 1, 2019) After some time, many people have reviewed the specification and they’ve identified some issues that need to be addressed before we launch the version 2.0.0. Actually, this process will never finish but we have to decide on a date to stop reviewing and move forward.
